newsitem.title: UK: Volatile prices stimulate cotton enquiry in Europe.
newsitem.headline: Volatile prices stimulate cotton enquiry in Europe.

text.p: West African and Central Asian origins saw a round of price-testing enquiry on Europe's raw cotton markets, industry sources reported on Friday.

Although there were few firm trades, the volatility of cotton prices on the international stage encouraged some spinners to take another look at their requirements and interest took a minor upturn, traders said.
Meanhwile, Italy is awaiting the arrival of a sales delegation from Syria where a significant range of qualities from the 1996-7 crop remains unsold, one major industry organisation said.
